messages.message: Hey, do we have plans to make the deployment metrics accessible via API? I had a question on this from Citi today
This would be pretty nice to have cc @jack.robbins @Elan Sharony

the new dashboards are at least partially built on top of the existing IB platform apis right? https://platform.instabase.com/docs/apis/v2-apis/automation-metrics/index.html

@Hamish do you have any more details on what sorts of reports Citi is looking for, and where the AI Hub Deployment metrics fall short?

Yep everything displayed on the UI is serviced by the platform's /automation-metrics endpoint. Only gap here is updating the documentation to include some of the recently introduced aggregation options. Will create a docs ticket to update

This was just a general request. When I showed the deployment metrics they were impressed, they just wanted to know if they could access the information via API to supplement their own data analysis or internal metrics. I didn't qualify a lot - I think its just more the expectation that since everything else is API driven, then getting metrics data should be also
From the internal enablement sessions I thought it was already accessible via API? @Brian

@david.lee Oh yes, @andy mentioned that the API behind deployment metrics are exposable so that they can plug into their own analysis/visualization solutions (PBI, etc)

I'll let Andy correct/confirm :slightly_smiling_face:
